title: In the Apocalypse, Jiao Jiao Struggled Every Day - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Romance   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: Abusive Characters   Apocalypse   Beautiful Female Lead   Childish Protagonist   Cryostasis   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Abilities   Male Yandere   Misunderstandings   Naive Protagonist   Possessive Characters   Post-apocalyptic   Selfish Protagonist   Transmigration   Zombies
author: 田园泡
description:
When she woke up, Su Ruan found that she had transmigrated into a novel. 

The male lead in it was a demon who liked to pretend to be a weak chicken. And she was the spicy chicken dodder flower character who abandoned the male lead in the midst of zombies…

According to the plot, her ending was terrible. She would be cut into pieces...>
